mapper.select: select userId,userName,password,flag from bguser where userName=#{userName} and password=#{password}
SELECT username,password,name as role FROM bguser u LEFT JOIN role r ON u.roleId = r.id WHERE code = #{username}
SELECT r.id,r.name,r.pid,r.path, r.component, r.icon from resource r,role_resource rs where r.id=rs.resource_id and role_id=#{id}

select userId,code, username,password,sex,birthday,phone,email,b.create_time,r.duty as role,flag from bguser b, role r where b.roleId=r.id and code like concat('%',#{code},'%') and username like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
mapper.update: update bguser set flag = #{flag} where userId=#{id}
